duties_responsibilities.duty: Acquire net new clients by leading business development efforts and solution initiatives.
Engage with senior clients on strategic initiatives such as cloud migration, application and infrastructure modernization, AI, ML, and automation.
Design comprehensive transformation propositions based on strong domain knowledge of the industry.
Manage end-to-end sales process for all opportunities, including initial client communication, presentations, RFI response, client workshops, RFP submission, negotiation, and deal signing.
Identify customer pain points and business objectives to create a roadmap of opportunities.
Generate qualified leads, pursue pipeline to closure, and ensure end-to-end delivery of opportunities.
Engage with internal stakeholders in a multi-geography environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business or related field (Master's preferred)
